description:
X-Men Dark Phoenix was the 12th film in Fox’s long-running mutant-inspired franchise, and it’s the fourth film in the colloquially termed “First Class” era.  Though after the success of almost a dozen X-Men films the franchise was starting to lose steam fast.  But how exactly did the X-Men franchise fall from grace so hard?  Was X-Men Dark Phoenix set up to fail? 

#xmen #darkphoenix #marvel #nerdstalgic 

Sources: 
https://comicbookmovie.com/x_men/dark-phoenix/dark-phoenix-concept-art-reveals-the-hellfire-club-including-emma-frost-the-strucker-twins-and-more-a172332#gs.27yltb
https://web.archive.org/web/20170606080821/http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/heat-vision/x-men-apocalypse-confusing-chronology-897957
https://screenrant.com/dark-phoenix-movie-reshoot-changes-explained-fox-xmen/
title: How THIS Became The Worst X-Men Movie
